NOT(ISCHANGED(Total_Bookings__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(of_new_business_opportunities__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(of_Opportunities__c )), NOT(ISCHANGED(OEM__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Upsells_created_button__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(One_Off_Upsells_created_button__c)), NOT(ISCHANGED(Timestamp_Last_Contact_Added__c)) )
